definition: A process or activity undertaken to get ready for an upcoming evaluation or assessment, typically involving studying, reviewing materials, and practicing relevant skills. It is commonly used in educational contexts, particularly when referring to the preparation for exams, tests, or assessments.

examples.english: The exam preparation was very intense.

examples.german: Ich habe viel Zeit in die Prüfungsvorbereitung investiert.
examples.english: I invested a lot of time in exam preparation.
The exam preparation courses are very helpful.
The exam preparation was worth it.
